title: CompanyOS Data Spine Envelope v1
description: Canonical envelope for all CompanyOS Data Spine events.

event_id.description: Stable, unique identifier for the emitted event (UUIDv4 recommended).

event_type.description: Fully-qualified event type including domain and version (e.g., authz.decision.v1).

event_version.description: Semantic version for the event payload schema.

occurred_at.description: Timestamp when the action happened at the source (ISO 8601).

recorded_at.description: Timestamp when the event was recorded on the Data Spine transport (ISO 8601).

tenant_id.description: Tenant that owns the resource or request context.

subject_id.description: Authenticated subject id (user/service); may be null for system-originated events.

source_service.description: Canonical name of the producing service (e.g., authz-gateway).

trace_id.description: Distributed trace identifier for correlating with APM traces.

correlation_id.description: Client-provided correlation id for tying related events together.

region.description: Region or cell in which the event originated (useful for multi-region ops).

data.description: Event-specific payload defined by the event_type schema.
